_documentation.description: Example configuration for Vrooli local code execution. Copy to execution.local.json and modify as needed.
_documentation.security_note: This example configuration is intentionally restrictive. For development, you may need to enable additional languages and paths.
usage: 3. Add required languages to allowedLanguages array
4. Configure allowedPaths for your specific needs
5. Adjust security settings as appropriate for your environment

language_support.javascript: Always supported. Runs in Node.js environment.
language_support.shell: Requires bash executable. For development scripts and system interaction.
language_support.python: Requires python3 executable. For data processing and automation.

path_security.allowedPaths: Whitelist of directories where code can execute. Relative to project root.
path_security.deniedPaths: Blacklist takes precedence over allowedPaths. Protects sensitive directories.
path_security.note: Paths are resolved relative to the project root directory.
